Class HDBOfficer

java.lang.Object
bto.Entities.User
bto.Entities.HDBOfficer
public class HDBOfficer extends User
Represents an HDB officer in the BTO system.

The HDBOfficer class extends the User class and represents staff members who process applications, respond to enquiries, and handle flat bookings. HDB officers have a dual role as they can also apply for flats as applicants through their embedded applicant role.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBOfficer

      public HDBOfficer()
      Default constructor for creating an HDBOfficer. Initializes empty lists for assigned projects and registrations, and creates a default applicant role.

    • HDBOfficer

      public HDBOfficer(String nric, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, String name)
      Creates an HDBOfficer with specified personal information. Also initializes the embedded applicant role with the same information.
      Parameters:
      nric - The officer's National Registration Identity Card number
      password - The officer's password for system access
      age - The officer's age
      maritalStatus - The officer's marital status
      name - The officer's name

  • Method Details

    • registerForProject

      public boolean registerForProject(Project project)
      Registers the officer for a project.

      Officers cannot register for projects that they have applied for as an applicant.

      Parameters:
      project - The project to register for
      Returns:
      true if registration was successful, false otherwise

    • viewRegistrationStatus

      public String viewRegistrationStatus()
      Retrieves the registration status for all projects registered for.
      Returns:
      A string representation of all registration statuses

    • updateFlatAvailability

      public boolean updateFlatAvailability(FlatType flatType)
      Updates the availability of a specific flat type in assigned projects.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to update availability for
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • retrieveApplication

      public ProjectApplication retrieveApplication(String nric)
      Retrieves an application by applicant NRIC.

      Officers cannot retrieve their own applications.

      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      The application associated with the NRIC, or null if not found or not allowed

    • updateBookingStatus

      public boolean updateBookingStatus(ProjectApplication application, FlatType flatType)
      Updates the booking status for an application with a specified flat type.

      Officers cannot update their own applications.

      Parameters:
      application - The application to update
      flatType - The flat type for the booking
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • generateReceipt

      public String generateReceipt(ProjectApplication application)
      Generates a receipt for a booking application.

      Officers cannot generate receipts for their own applications.

      Parameters:
      application - The application to generate a receipt for
      Returns:
      The receipt as a string, or null if not allowed

    • respondToEnquiry

      public boolean respondToEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Responds to an enquiry from an applicant.

      Officers cannot respond to their own enquiries.

      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to respond to
      Returns:
      true if the response was recorded successfully, false otherwise

    • displayProfile

      public String displayProfile()
      Displays the officer's profile information including personal details, assigned projects, and any active applications made through the applicant role.
      Overrides:
      displayProfile in class User
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the officer's profile information

    • getAssignedProjectDetails

      public List<Project> getAssignedProjectDetails()
      Gets detailed information about all projects assigned to the officer.
      Returns:
      List of assigned projects with details

    • applyForProject

      public boolean applyForProject(Project project)
      Applies for a project through the officer's applicant role.

      Officers cannot apply for projects they are assigned to.

      Parameters:
      project - The project to apply for
      Returns:
      true if the application was successful, false otherwise

      Returns:
      The current application status, or null if no application exists

      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal request was successful, false otherwise
